languages.text: [Достать оружие] "Уверен{mf||а}, убийство спятившего болтуна-святоши — простительный грех... для Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: [Достать оружие] "Уверен{mf||а}, убийство спятившего болтуна-святоши — простительный грех... для Вольного Торговца".

languages.text: [Draw your weapon] "A sanctimonious blowhard who has clearly taken leave of his senses. I'm sure killing you would be a forgivable trespass... for a Rogue Trader."
languages.original_text: [Достать оружие] "Уверен{mf||а}, убийство спятившего болтуна-святоши — простительный грех... для Вольного Торговца".

traits.locale_text: [Draw your weapon] "Surely the sin of killing a deranged holy talker is a forgivable one... for a Rogue Trader."
[Draw your weapon] "Surely the sin of killing a deranged holy talker is a forgivable one... for a Rogue Trader."
[Draw your weapon] "A sanctimonious blowhard who has clearly taken leave of his senses. I'm sure killing you would be a forgivable sin... for a Rogue Trader."
[Draw your weapon] "A sanctimonious blowhard who has clearly taken leave of his senses. I'm sure killing you would be a forgivable sin... for a Rogue Trader."
[Draw your weapon] "A sanctimonious blowhard who has clearly taken leave of his senses. I'm sure killing you would be a forgivable trespass... for a Rogue Trader."

languages.text: [拔出武器]“很显然，你只是个自以为是的牛皮大王，连脑子都迷糊了。我相信，就算我杀了你，也没什么大不了的……毕竟，我是行商浪人。”
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "A sanctimonious blowhard who has clearly taken leave of his senses. I'm sure killing you would be a forgivable trespass... for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: [拔出武器]“很显然，你只是个自以为是的牛皮大王，连脑子都不清醒了。我相信就算杀了你，也是可以原谅的罪过……对行商浪人而言。”

languages.text: [Sacar el arma] «No es más que un fanfarrón que ha perdido la cordura. No dudo que acabar con su vida será una transgresión perdonable... para un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente».
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "A sanctimonious blowhard who has clearly taken leave of his senses. I'm sure killing you would be a forgivable trespass... for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: [Sacar el arma] «No es más que un fanfarrón que ha perdido la cordura. No dudo que acabar con su vida será un pecado perdonable... para un{mf||a} Comerciante Independiente».

languages.text: [武器を構える]「口ばかり達者な正気を失った傲慢な奴め。自由開拓者であれば…お前を殺しても、どうせ許されるだろう」
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "A sanctimonious blowhard who has clearly taken leave of his senses. I'm sure killing you would be a forgivable trespass... for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: [武器を構える]「口ばかり達者な正気を失った傲慢な奴め。自由開拓者であれば…お前を殺しても、どうせ許されるだろう」

languages.text: [Deine Waffe ziehen] "Ein scheinheiliger Aufschneider, dessen Sinne ihn offensichtlich im Stich gelassen haben. Ich bin sicher, Euch zu töten, wäre eine verzeihliche Sünde ... für {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}."
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "A sanctimonious blowhard who has clearly taken leave of his senses. I'm sure killing you would be a forgivable trespass... for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: [Deine Waffe ziehen] "Ein scheinheiliger Aufschneider, dessen Sinne ihn offensichtlich im Stich gelassen haben. Ich bin sicher, Euch zu töten, wäre eine verzeihliche Sünde ... für {mf|einen Freihändler|eine Freihändlerin}."

languages.text: [Dégainer votre arme] « Un fanfaron moralisateur qui a visiblement perdu la tête. Votre mort serait sans doute une transgression tout à fait pardonnable... pour {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. »
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "A sanctimonious blowhard who has clearly taken leave of his senses. I'm sure killing you would be a forgivable trespass... for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: [Dégainer votre arme] « Un fanfaron moralisateur qui a visiblement perdu la tête. Votre mort serait sans doute un péché tout à fait pardonnable... pour {mf|un libre-marchand|une libre-marchande}. »

languages.text: [Silahını çek] "Aklını yitirdiğin belli. Dindarlık taslayan bir palavracısın. Eminim seni öldürmek, affedilir kabahatlerden sayılacaktır... En azından işleyen bir Hür Tacir olunca."
languages.original_text: [Draw your weapon] "A sanctimonious blowhard who has clearly taken leave of his senses. I'm sure killing you would be a forgivable trespass... for a Rogue Trader."

traits.locale_text: [Silahını çek] "Aklını yitirdiği belli, dindarlık taslayan bir palavracı. Eminim seni öldürmek göz ardı edilecek bir suç olurdu. Bir Hür Tacir için."
